c74object.name: pdm.scale.length

inlet.description: Any signal input triggers the calculation of the scale length from the intervals buffer.

outlet.description: Outputs the number of degrees in the scale. Returns -1 if the scale intervals are not properly ordered.

c74object.description: Calculates the length of a scale in degrees by analyzing the intervals buffer. The object validates that the scale intervals are in ascending order before calculating the length. If the first interval is not 0, the length is increased by 1 to account for the root note. Returns -1 if the scale intervals are not properly ordered.
c74object.digest: Calculate the length of a scale in degrees.
